snippet: With N.H.L. teams on track to begin a lockout at midnight Saturday, the highly regarded free-agent forward Shane Doan re-signed with the Phoenix Coyotes.
abstract: NHL teams are on track to begin a lockout, and the league engages in a bevy of activity almost everywhere but the bargaining table; separately, highly regarded free-agent Shane Doan resigns with the Phoenix Coyotes; other hockey new noted.
lead_paragraph: With N.H.L. teams on track to begin a lockout at midnight Saturday, the highly regarded free-agent forward Shane Doan re-signed with the Phoenix Coyotes.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Nears Lockout as Shane Doan Re-Signs With Coyotes
headline.main: As N.H.L. Nears Lockout, Doan Re-Signs With Coyotes
headline.print_headline: As N.H.L. Nears Lockout, Doan Re-Signs With Coyotes
